lines.text: I think the lady needs a friend, and we're the friendly type.
I couldn't find your name on the passenger list.
No, no, I'm using my maiden name.
If we don't find Miss Howard he may be able to convict us of a murder we didn't commit. Electrocutuion is so permanent.
You thrive on this sort of excitement, don't you?
Well, it's better than vegetating.
Couldn't anyone ever make you live like other people do?
You mean a normal life with a social security number and a bank book?
[Chuckles]
I'm afraid not.
Not anyone?
Unh-unh.
Why?
Because she'd probably want to wait up for me nights with a light burning in the window.
Is that bad?
Yes. I'm not in the habit of entering a house until all the lights are out.
Why do those men want to kill you?
I don't think they like me.
Your freaks are running amok. You oughta feed 'em more often.
Please believe me, I'm telling you the truth
I could use a bit of the truth.
Quick get a cop, we got a dead doll on our hands.
Who are you, or who do you think you are?
At the moment, I'm the fugitive from an autopsy.
